name: Mother
interpretation:
Encountering the mother in dreams or visions may signal a call to explore nurturing protection and creative love. Jung might see the mother as an archetypal pattern of human development, while Hillman could explore its role in personal myth-making and soul-work. Mythologically, the mother appears across cultures as a symbol of nurturing, protection. Esoteric traditions might frame it as a key to understanding nurturing protection and creative love. If the mother appears in your experience, consider what aspects of nurturing protection and creative love are seeking attention in your life.

— Inspired by Jung, Hillman, Campbell, Grof, ARAS, and archetypal wisdom traditions.
